text: @PressSec Ironic! Haven’t heard any platitudes like this re: the 134k+ who’ve died of #COVID19, during the many school shootings on his watch or of black men killed by racist police. But when you can make it divisive and political, by all means🙄 #FailedLeadership #dividerinchief #shutup
